documents.content: Our return policy allows customers to return items within 30 days of purchase with original receipt. Exceptions include personalized items, final sale products, and items marked as non-returnable. Returns are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the item.

Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the continental United States. Express shipping is available for 1-2 day delivery at additional cost. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on destination. All orders over $50 qualify for free standard shipping.

We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. For orders over $500, we also offer payment plans through Affirm with 0% APR for qualified customers. Gift cards can be used for any purchase.

test_queries.question: What is your return policy?
test_queries.expected_answer: 30-day returns with receipt, except personalized/final sale items

test_queries.question: How long does shipping take?
test_queries.expected_answer: Standard 3-5 days, express 1-2 days, international 7-14 days

test_queries.question: Can I return personalized items?
test_queries.expected_answer: No, personalized items are excluded from returns

test_queries.question: Compare your standard vs express shipping options and help me decide which is best for a gift.
test_queries.expected_answer: Detailed comparison with recommendation based on timing needs
